original: 報告！<color=#fff999>$country1</color>勢力對我軍將領<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>提出<color=#c0f5ff>招募</color>請求，所幸<color=#c0f5ff>此舉未成</color>。
text: Report! <color=#fff999>$country1</color> The forces made a request for <color=#c0f5ff>recruitment</color> to our general <color=#fff999>$leader1</color>. Fortunately <color=#c0f5ff> This did not happen</color>.
